create:
(:action create_small_studio ; create a small studio for macro photography
      :parameters (?p - person ?s - studio)
      :precondition (and (not (has_studio ?p ?s)))
      :effect (and (has_studio ?p ?s))
)
diffuse:
(:action diffuse_light ; diffuse light for the small subject in the studio
      :parameters (?p - person ?l - light)
      :precondition (and (has_studio ?p ?s) (has_reflector ?p ?r) (not (has_diffused_light ?p ?l)))
      :effect (and (has_diffused_light ?p ?l))
)
start:
(:action start_experimenting ; start experimenting with macro photography
      :parameters (?p - person ?e - experiment)
      :precondition (and (has_studio ?p ?s) (has_reflector ?p ?r) (has_closeup_lens ?p ?l) (has_diffused_light ?p ?l))
      :effect (and (is_experimenting ?p ?e))
)
```

These actions follow the guidelines and structure provided in the example and are tailored to the specific steps and descriptions of the task "Learn Photography by Shooting Macro".
have:
(:action have_appropriate_reflector ; ensure the appropriate sized reflectors are available
      :parameters (?p - person ?r - reflector)
      :precondition (and (has_studio ?p ?s) (not (has_reflector ?p ?r)))
      :effect (and (has_reflector ?p ?r))
)
closeup:
(:action closeup_lens ; ensure a closeup lens is available for macro photography
      :parameters (?p - person ?l - lens)
      :precondition (and (has_studio ?p ?s) (not (has_closeup_lens ?p ?l)))
      :effect (and (has_closeup_lens ?p ?l))
)
